price: Sungguh, Kami mengetahui bahwa apa yang mereka katakan itu menyedihkan hatimu (Muhammad), (janganlah bersedih hati) karena sebenarnya mereka bukan mendustakanmu, tetapi orang zalim itu mengingkari ayat-ayat Allah.
arabic: قَدۡ نَعۡلَمُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيَحۡزُنُكَ ٱلَّذِي يَقُولُونَۖ فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُكَذِّبُونَكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qad naʿlamu innahu layaḥzunuka alladhī yaqūlūna fa-innahum lā yukadhibūnaka walākinna al-ẓālimīna biāyāti al-lahi yajḥadūna
